messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] writing in mirror image
messages.msgSnippet: ... Before I began homeschooling (and then unschooling) I taught Pre-K and Kindergarten (at a private school) and mirror writing is very very common. Many
messages.messageBody:
> Writing in mirror image is very common among
> children, so don't worry
> about it.

Before I began homeschooling (and then unschooling) I
taught Pre-K and Kindergarten (at a private school)
and mirror writing is very very common. Many children
do complete mirror writing and most do at least some.
Not to worry at all!
Michele

messages.subject: writing in mirror image
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Writing in mirror image is very common among children, so don t worry about it. My daughter did this, and at some point over the past three years, she
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
Writing in mirror image is very common among children, so don't worry
about it. My daughter did this, and at some point over the past three years,
she corrected it. She is 8 and occasionally writes backwards, but she
recognizes it now, before she couldn't see it.
Wendy
